PPLoc: For employees and contractors: The Coca-Cola Company intranet; for website: http://www.thecoca-colacompany.com/privacy.html
activities: The Coca-Cola Company uses consumer and customer data primarily for customer support activities, such as fulfilling product orders, administering programs in which consumers have elected to participate, and marketing activities.  The Coca-Cola Company uses human resources data for employee management and administration generally.
contacttitle1: Sr. Employment Counsel, Office of the General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data, Consumer Data, Customer Data on-line & off-line
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs); For all other types of data: JAMS (Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services)
